name: deploy
description: Scripts for generating HCL and interacting with Terraform

scripts.apply-local: ENV=local npm run generate && terraform workspace select local && terraform apply -parallelism=40 -var-file='local.tfvars'
scripts.apply-staging: ENV=staging npm run generate && terraform workspace select staging && terraform apply -parallelism=40 -var-file='staging.tfvars'
scripts.apply-production: ENV=production npm run generate && terraform workspace select production && terraform apply -parallelism=40 -var-file='production.tfvars'
scripts.terraform-setup: npm run terraform-init && terraform workspace new local && terraform workspace new staging && terraform workspace new production && terraform workspace select local
